summary: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. If a part of your ship is gay/queer good for...
body: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. If a part of your ship is gay/queer good for them but their private life is different than a fanfiction or a ship. Just remember, Shipping is not bad, pushing people into a relationship or talk about their private life is.

reblog.comment: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. If a part of your ship is gay/queer good for them but their private life is different than a fanfiction or a ship. Just remember, Shipping is not bad, pushing people into a relationship or talk about their private life is.

Just remember, Shipping is not bad, pushing people into a relationship or talk about their private life is.

Just remember, Shipping is not bad, pushing people into a relationship or talk about their private life is.

summary: as a 20 year old girl who went to an all girls school, i so so so relate to dan through his struggle with his identity. so many...
body: as a 20 year old girl who went to an all girls school, i so so so relate to dan through his struggle with his identity. so many girls at my school would call my “lesbo” and “gay” and it was so fucking hard trying to fit in as the quiet, shy girl when everyone around you was cruel and homophobic. and the crazy thing is, this pride month, at least five of those people (that i know of) have come out. i use the word “bisexual” on myself because i see it as a cushion of some sort - as in, “yeah i like girls BUT i do still like boys” when in reality that’s just… not me. i still struggle with my sexuality. ive never come out to a single person irl (the internet only knows and thank god no one from my real life follows me on here) but growing up in such a homophobic area full of teasing and hatred and the way lesbians were portrayed as gross and disgusting broke me. my first crush was on a girl called monica. her sister was an openly gay girl at our school with an openly gay girlfriend. they were both cool as hell goth girlfriends that were bullied relentlessly every damn day. not a single person did a single thing to help them. people laughed at them, made jokes about them, and it was then, that i realised that i just didn’t ever want that. how could i tell the girl of my dreams i liked her, when her sister was going through that hell? im still not over my own shit. im trying though. every day i feel like im closer to my own understanding of my sexuality. i won’t be called ‘disgusting’ i won’t be called ‘a lesbo’. because im none of those things. im me, and someday i’ll tell people in real life that. i’ll be sure to be loud and proud when i feel like the time is right. so thank you, dan, for all that you’ve done. you’ve put so much perspective onto mine, and so many others lives and how they should just fucking love themselves even when it’s tough as hell

blog.description: 23 💕 fan of veggie burritos and iced lattes 🌯🍼

summary: holy wow hi it’s 7:00am here, i haven’t slept, but i have some FEELINGS. i’m sure i’ll fail to articulate them but righty ho...
body:
holy wow hi it’s 7:00am here, i haven’t slept, but i have some FEELINGS. i’m sure i’ll fail to articulate them but righty ho let’s go. or gay. lmao bye.

i started watching dan and phil in 2009. i was 14 years old. i’m 23 now. literally grown up w them. and boy howdy was i closeted. but like dan sorta touched on, emo was coming in and being bi was “cool”. i was tentatively toying w that label. also on MySpace lmao. but i’d also grown up being traumatised into thinking gay was a dirty word/concept. i was also viciously outed against my will around that time. dan and phil are one of my only good memories from that time of my life. i’ve since come out properly and i’m much happier, but watching dan’s video today reminded me of that time and how far you can come and how much you can heal when given the chance. i’m so endlessly proud of him and i hope he knows how many lives he’s touched.

title: Missing you
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/31w5pE3

by Jack Wilson-Parker (spideymerc)

Phil watched as the Skype call went through and Dan’s beautiful, pixelated face showed up on his laptop. His smile was wide and he looked really happy, Phil missed seeing this side of Dan; he just missed Dan in general.

-
Phil is in Florida, Dan is not. Phil misses him

(title might get changed cos it sucks)
